name: kTester
subtitle: KRepo sub-branch 01
descrption: [ ALTSTORE ] repo made for experimenting new additions to the aio repo

apps.name: theta
apps.subtitle: get more out of your instagram account!
apps.versionDescription:
1.4 changelog:
[ + ] fixed a typo in the banner that confirms you left a story unseen. also fixed an issue where this banner would be shown no matter what. this banner only shows when the 'show banners' feature is enabled.]
[ + ] fixed 'hide create tab' feature to work on latest instagram version.
[ + ] in favor for a more 'selective' approach for saving posts, a solution was implemented that allows the end user to view all the pictures/videos of a post in a view controller where they can select individual or just one to download.
 [ - ] the previous feature heavily relies on internet connection!
[ + ] altered the spacing between the icon and text in the custom banners to look better.
apps.localizedDescription: a brand new, clean and polished tweak that allows for many features, including but not limited to:

news.title: added theta!
news.caption: theta 1.4 by objc_msgsend has been added to the repo!
